meanings.definition: A sleeveless garment worn under a shirt or blouse.
meanings.sent1: She wore a soft undervest under her school uniform to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: The white undervest peeked out from under his dress shirt.
meanings.sent3: The undervest was so cozy, she wished she could wear it on the outside.
meanings.sent4: Her undervest was like a hidden shield against the chilly weather.
meanings.sent5: The undervest felt like a gentle hug all day long.

meanings.definition: To wear an undervest under a sweater for added warmth.
meanings.sent1: During winter, she would undervest under her sweater to keep cozy.
meanings.sent2: He always undervests when the temperature drops to stay comfortable.
meanings.sent3: She undervests even in summer, just in case the AC is too cold.
meanings.sent4: Undervesting is his secret to staying warm without bulky layers.
meanings.sent5: They undervest religiously to combat the chilly office air conditioning.
